title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1630-1.5 - Authority to submit duplicate policies for division approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1630-1.5 - Authority to submit duplicate policies for division approval

State Regulations

Duplicate copies of all insurance policies, including
all endorsements, shall be forwarded to division for checking before payment of
premiums by authority. After review of each duplicate policy, division will
issue approval slip which shall be affixed to original insurance policy by
authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1630-1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
